headline.main: U. S. GIVING SOVIET PLANE PRIORITY; Our Material Aid Will Be Limited Henceforth Only by Shipping Facilities U. S. GIVING SOVIET PRIORITY ON PLANES

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 30 -- Fastmoving events in Russia have prompted, within the last few days, the adoption of an Administration policy whereby combat planes and related war materials are to be supplied to the Soviet armies even at the expense of the United States Army, subject only to limitations on transportation.
abstract: Wash bases policy on resistance line East of Ural Mts
